definition[0]: someone who buys and sells goods in large quantities
example[0]: the son of a wealthy merchant
definition[1]: a person or organization that buys and sells goods or a particular type of goods
example[1]: US tobacco merchants are depending more and more on international sales.
definition[2]: used by CREDIT CARD companies to talk about the shops etc that accept their cards
example[3]: Today, over 18 million merchants accept Visa.
